firstblock.subTitle:
Find your safe ground in the world of KYC
with the RecognID all-in-one product.

weoffer.title: What we offer
text: RecognID covers a wide range of possibilities for clients to go through eKYC and AML processes online.
We provide them with handy verification processes according to AML, KYC regulation (including GDPR).
Let our identity verification software do the hard work for you.

items.title: Liveness detection
items.description: Sophisticated onboarding technologies preventing any spoofing attempts.

items.title: Face search & matching
items.description: Reliable account protection allows to avoid duplicate accounts with no additional authorizations.

items.title: Age detection
items.description: A must-have solution for products requiring age restrictions. No personal data storage or transfer included.

items.title:
ID doc capturing,
OCR and verification
items.description: Onboard clients without long questionnaires. Solution recognise long global ID doc list, including templates, photo matching, MRZ, photoshop detection, screen photo detection.

items.title:
Check in PEP, sanctions
& AML watchlist
items.description: Comply with regulatory requirements to fully eliminate any reputation risks.

items.title: UI/UX customization
items.description: A set of customization tools allow to bring uniqueness into the product as well as to adapt it to corporate identity standards.

integration.title: We make it simple to integrate our KYC software with your business ecosystem.

items.title: Web SDK
items.descriptiom: Ready-made solutions for automated onboarding with fast set-up and easy configuration.

items.title: Mobile SDK
items.descriptiom: Send a link to customers and get verification results instantly in your Admin Panel or via webhook.

items.title: Webhooks
items.descriptiom: Highly-customisable iOS and Android SDKs built on native tech stack for a seamless onboarding experience.

items.title: API integration (coming soon)
items.descriptiom: Integrate our KYC and customer verification solutions into your platform, collect the data you need and get the results via API.

items.title: KYC over onboarding process

innerList.text: ID doc capturing and type recognising

items.footnote: Applies to global markets, form-free, secure.

items.title: KYC monitoring
items.footnote: Background checks, minimum user interactions, built-in anti-fraud.

items.title:
Authentication via Biometric
(3D mask)
items.footnote: Account authorization and recovery, exclusion of duplication, risk management.

items.title: Age detection
items.footnote: Access restriction without ID provided, up to 99,9% accuracy.

itemsList.title: FinTech
itemsList.description: Our solutions offer the best fit for online banks, wallets and P2P lending services.

itemsList.title: Crypto
itemsList.description: Secure onboarding for any type of crypto business, including CEX, DEX, token sale platforms.

itemsList.title: Gaming
itemsList.description: Fast and comprehensible client verification for both sports betting and online casino companies.

itemsList.title: Insurance
itemsList.description: Get the most of your business with proper fraud prevention, PEP/AML checking, identity and address proofing.

itemsList.title: Telecom
itemsList.description: Stay compliant with the telecom regulators, prevent fraud and verify your customer identity with RecognID.

itemsList.title: Mobility
itemsList.description: A huge variety of onboarding services implemented for a modern dynamic landscape: check-ins, bookings, car sharing and many others.

itemsList.title: Esports
itemsList.description: Drive the industry with user-friendly verification processes for both platforms and players.

cookiesPopup.text:

By clicking ‚ÄúAccept all cookies‚Äù you give consent to install and store on your device all necessary and optional cookies.
